description: Update ecr client to latest version
Fix issue where "EnhancedMonitoring" was not displayed when running ``aws kinesis describe-stream`` (`#1929 <https://github.com/aws/aws-cli/issues/1929>`__)
Update acm client to latest version
Update ec2 client to latest version
Update sts client to latest version

In the rest xml parser, we were converting the input we recieve into a `str`, which was causing failures on python 2 when multibyte unicode strings were passed in. The fix is to simply use `six.text_type`, which is `unicode` on 2 and `str` on 3. The string will be encoded into the default encoding later on in the serializer. Fixes `#868 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/issues/868>`__
Update cognito-idp client to latest version
